extendedInfo.description: Day 1 Single Mothers Protection Center will have an audience that ranges over the entire primary target market, yet with a special emphasis on single mothers. The services we provide will be used to solve many of the controversial issues that face inner-city neighborhoods and low subsidized housing areas such as depression, poverty, unemployment, disease and lack of education.  The programs and events will generate a sense of hope while still capturing the imagination of the young and old.Day 1 Single Mothers Protection Center will provide a variety of services and products to the public in one facility. It is very critical that our personnel are specialist in their field of expertise.
